Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet high standards. It comes with a range of features designed to enhance your experience. Given its quality and the effort put into its creation, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $100. However, to make this opportunity accessible, I'm offering it to you for an introductory price of $95. This is a limited-time offer, so I hope you'll consider taking advantage of it. If you have any questions or need further information, please let me know. Looking forward to your response! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
